text: dhikkarigalu tam'ma managalalli ud'dhatatanavannu (matravalla,) ajnanada ud'dhatatanavannu belesikondaga, allahanu tanna dutarige hagu visvasigalige manah santiyannu ilisikottanu mattu avarannu dharmanistheya matinalli sthiragolisidanu. Avaru adakke heccu ar'haru hagu yogyaragiddaru. Mattu allahanu ellavannu ballavanagiddane
